means: 学习( learn的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She had decided to confront Kathryn with what she had learnt.
sentence.Network_cn: 她决定拿自己了解的事实与凯瑟琳当面对证。

sentence.Network_en: She'd learnt to be herself and to stand up for her convictions.
sentence.Network_cn: 她已经学会了按自己的方式行事，坚持自己的信仰。

sentence.Network_en: They learnt a lot from the initial market testing exercise.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们从最初的市场测试中了解了许多信息。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Module 2 unit1 she learnt English教案(四) 学习目标 1、学会词汇learnt these dancer 2、能听懂会说Unit 1这篇对话。 3、、学习目标语句:Did your grandma.
1. learylearnt 获悉leasable 可出租的
what have you learnt from the book ., 你从这本书中学到了什么.
yes , she learnt english ., 是的 , 她学过英语.

list.abs: there they learnt to build houses ., 在那里他们学会了盖房子.
how long have you learnt english ., 你学英语有多久了.
I learnt a lot of words like this ,, 用这种方法我学了很多单词.
learnt是什么意思|learnt的中文意思... ... learnt bad ： 学坏 lessons learnt ： 经验教训 Instruments Learnt ： 文书学习.

entry.def: Learnt is a past tense and past participle of learn.

auth_sentence.content: Mr Coplin says there are lessons to be learnt.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr Coplin says there are lessons to be learnt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr Coplin says there are lessons to be learnt.

auth_sentence.content: The accent I had I learnt from my mother.
auth_sentence.res_content: The accent I had I learnt from my mother.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The accent I had I learnt from my mother.

auth_sentence.content: So what have I learnt from my internet-dating odyssey?
auth_sentence.res_content: So what have I learnt from my internet-dating odyssey?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So what have I learnt from my internet-dating odyssey?

Sentence.sentence: He has discovered it – babies don't even know that language exists – and he has found out how it works and learnt to use it appropriately.
Growing up in San Francisco, he learnt Spanish from his immigrant parents.
The more is taught, the less is learnt.
James hiked, fished, learnt to sail and experimented with hot air ballooning.
